synopsis.text:
Koda and Yamaguchi, childhood neighbors turned art school classmates, share a dream and a club. The duo, along with their eclectic group of friends, form Akindo, a club dedicated to showcasing their artistic creations. From Mikako's fashion designs to Tsutomu's artwork, the club is a vibrant mix of creativity and camaraderie. Their creations, including clothing, dolls, and jewelry, are sold at local flea markets, drawing admiration and interest from fellow students.

During a two-day school fair, Akindo and its members seize the opportunity to attract new members. However, when Tsutomu and another member, Body-ko, gain a significant amount of attention, Mikako's jealousy erupts, casting a shadow over the club's efforts.

This alternate retelling of the beloved anime series "Gokinjo Monogatari" offers a fresh perspective on the original plot, focusing on the trials and triumphs of the Akindo club and its members.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
